name: 適應控制
goals: Introducing adaptive control theory and application to motion control.
The ability for the analysis of the system identification (ID).
The ability for the design of adaptive controllers.
The ability using computer simulation tools for engineering practice analysis.

7th week    Self-tuning regulators

11th week    Model-reference adaptive systems
